flawed_nl_solution:
In 5 days, 2 * 5 = <<2*5=10>>10 peaches will ripen.
Three were eaten, so there will be 14 - 3 = <<14-3=11>>11 ripe peaches left.
There are 18 - 14 = <<18-14=6>>6 unripe peaches left.
Therefore, there will be 11 - 6 = <<11-6=5>>5 more ripe peaches than unripe peaches in the bowl after five days.
#### 5

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 6. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
